mapper.insert: insert into schedule(departure_airport, arrival_airport, departure_date, person_num) values(#{departure_airport}, #{arrival_airport}, #{departure_date}, #{person_num})
mapper.select: SELECT flight_id, flight_name, departure_airport, arrival_airport, departure_date, arrival_date, price FROM flight_info WHERE flight_id=#{flight_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ticket(user_id, schedule_id, final_price, final_date, flight_id, seat_id) values(#{user_id} , null, #{final_price}, now(), #{flight_id}, null)
mapper.select: SELECT ticket_id, user_id, schedule_id, final_price, final_date, flight_id, seat_id FROM ticket WHERE flight_id=#{flight_id}
